Actions.Name: Create content item requirements
Actions.Description: Creates content item requirements based on a template group.

Actions.Name: Execute query
Actions.Description: Executes a query on an AXtension Content Gate environment.

Actions.Name: Get linked business entities
Actions.Description: Gets all the linked business entities attached to a content item.

Actions.Name: List business entity connectors
Actions.Description: Lists all configured business entity connectors.

Actions.Name: List business entity types
Actions.Description: Lists all business entity types that are defined in the model.

Actions.Name: List content item template groups
Actions.Description: Lists the template groups for a content item.

Actions.Name: List content item templates
Actions.Description: Lists the templates for a content item.

Actions.Name: List all the user properties of a content item
Actions.Description: List all the user properties of a content item.

Actions.Name: List views
Actions.Description: Lists all views that are usable from Power Platform

Actions.Name: Store content
Actions.Description: Adds new content to an AXtension Content Gate environment.

Actions.Name: Updates the content item user property
Actions.Description: Update a user property of a content item.

Actions.Name: When content is added
Actions.Description: Trigger that is fired when content is added to a business entity.

Actions.Name: When content is deleted
Actions.Description: Trigger that is fired when content is deleted.

Actions.Name: When content is updated
Actions.Description: Trigger that is fired when content is updated. This can be either an update of the contents of a file or an update of the content item properties.
